front.title: A User Agent Profile Data Set for Media Policy

abstract.t: This specification defines a document format for media properties of Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) sessions, such as the codecs or media types used. This format is based on XML and extends the Schema for SIP User Agent Profile Data Sets. It is capable of expressing the media properties of a SIP session and can be used to summarize a SIP session or to formulate policies for a SIP session.
